title: MathJSON Julia Function Mappings
description: Schema for MathJSON.jl Julia function mapping definitions

mappings.description: Array of operator to Julia function mappings

operator.description: MathJSON operator name (must exist in operators.json)

julia_function.description: Julia function name or null if unmapped

module.description: Module containing the function (defaults to Base)

expression.description: Key for special/anonymous function in SPECIAL_FUNCTIONS dict
